mapper.select: SELECT a.eval_id, a.eval_ttl, a.cent_id, a.mem_id, a.wri_id, a.created_at FROM tb_evaluation a WHERE a.active = TRUE ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT a.eval_id, a.eval_ttl, a.cent_id, a.mem_id, a.wri_id, a.created_at FROM tb_evaluation a WHERE a.cent_id = #{centerId} AND a.active = TRUE ORDER BY a.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT a.eval_id, a.eval_ttl, a.eval_cont, a.cent_id, a.mem_id, a.wri_id, a.created_at, a.updated_at FROM tb_evaluation a WHERE a.eval_id = #{id} AND a.active = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_evaluation a WHERE a.active = TRUE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_evaluation a WHERE a.cent_id = #{centerId} AND a.active = TRUE;
